Text:
still awaiting my other 2 request... :)
The Final Countdown (1980) with Eng Sub

@E.Game I'm doing The Final Countdown right now and will upload today. I thought I had The Replacement Killers director's cut. I'm a huge Chow Yun Fat fan. It's out on DVD so I ordered. As soon as I find it. Ill upload

SteelerJ17 you're awesome!!! thanks a lot!!!
Chow Yun Fat always got good movie... At first when you upload The Killer (Criterion) I thought that was The Replacement Killers, but both are different story... The Killer is awesome movie too, I will like to know is there any Chinese sub on it? :)
I'm sorry as my request is usually old movie, hope you don't mind...

@E.Game The Killer (Criterion) only has English subs. I have never seen a Criterion that has more subs in it. Now I have to buy Hard Boiled (Criterion) and upload it. The Killer (Criterion) is my favorite cut of the film.
Hola SteelerJ17 no e tenido la oportunidad de agradecert por las peliculas que has compartido eres un muy buen aporte y se agradece arto por todo saludos y bendiciones.
@lalonestyle01 muchas gracias. i les gusta subir para usted
